## CLIConfigurationSpec.proxyConnectMode property

Default mode for `CONNECT` requests.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly proxyConnectMode?: ProxyConnectMode;
```

## Remarks

It can be changed at a request level in the [onProxyConnect](./kassette.configurationspec.onproxyconnect.md) method through [setMode](./kassette.iproxyconnectapi.setmode.md)<!-- -->.
